name: Sudoku Pro: Number Puzzle Game
description:
Sudoku Pro: Number Puzzle Game is a popular number puzzle game. Whether you want to relax, stay mentally active, or even exercise your logical and reasoning abilities, you can participate in a few free Sudoku puzzle games.

Our Sudoku game includes over 40000 classic Sudoku titles and sets six difficulty levels, making it suitable not only for beginners but also for advanced or higher end players. We have also developed powerful intelligent prompts that include over a dozen common Sudoku puzzle solving techniques, and all Sudoku puzzles can be solved using these techniques.

Game Features
Unique answer - each question has only one answer
Daily Challenge - One question per day to relax your brain
Achievement Trophy - Complete daily challenges and win trophies
Intelligent prompt - unable to solve? Prompt to help you pass the level
Note taking mode - easy to take notes like on paper

How to Play Sudoku
The goal of Sudoku games is to fill the 9x9 grid with numbers, so that each column, row, and 3x3 sub grid contains numbers between 1 and 9. At the beginning of the game, there will be some squares in the 9x9 palace that have already been filled with numbers. What you need to do is to use logic to fill in the missing numbers and complete the grid.

Start your wonderful day with a Sudoku Adventure by Number Pro!
Download this classic number logic game and enjoy free Sudoku puzzles.
